meanings.definition: A medical facility that provides a variety of health services
meanings.sent1: I went to the polyclinic for my check-up.
meanings.sent2: The polyclinic offers services such as vaccinations and physical therapy.
meanings.sent3: At the polyclinic, they even have a play area for kids in the waiting room.
meanings.sent4: The polyclinic is like a one-stop shop for all your healthcare needs.
meanings.sent5: Visiting the polyclinic is convenient because you can see different doctors in one place.

meanings.definition: A clinic where patients can receive treatment from multiple specialists
meanings.sent1: My grandmother visited the polyclinic to see the cardiologist and the neurologist.
meanings.sent2: The polyclinic has a team of doctors who work together to provide comprehensive care.
meanings.sent3: When I walked into the polyclinic, I felt like I was in a hospital maze.
meanings.sent4: The polyclinic is a hub of expertise where different specialists collaborate for patient wellness.
meanings.sent5: Receiving treatment at the polyclinic ensures that all aspects of your health are considered.
